name: Trench Run 3D
description:
Remade Trench Run in 3D

First ever project in 3D

Goal is to get to the end of the trench and shoot the red target, you only have 1 shot.

Limited testing due to time, physics can act odd sometimes you can't shoot the target, no credits or intro and you can't take a second run you have to restart the game, sorry just ran out of time.

Control:

WASD  

Space to shoot

Credits:

  • Art: CraftPix.net
  • Music: SoundImage.org

20 Second Game Jam entries Made with AGK found HERE.
